vs

Class DroopQuota

  • java.lang.Object
    • vs.DroopQuota

  • public class DroopQuota
extends java.lang.Object
    This class functions as the STV Droop Quota Algorithm it consists Shuffle() and GenerateAudit() methods so that it could shuffle ballots and display details to users it also write info into audit file when the algorithm is running
    Author:
    Pengyin Chen, Junren Huang

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      int total_seat

      this is the constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GenerateAudit()
      this is the GenerateAudit() method for the first round it will assign ballots to candidate and check if someone reach the droop number if a ballot's choice is a winner, then choice + 1 for the second round and so on remove candidates in the loser list with the least ballots redistribute his ballots to other non-winner candidate repeat until all seats are filled alone the way running the program write info to audit file and display the location when finished
      void ReadFile() 
      void Shuffle() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • Shuffle

        public void Shuffle()

      • GenerateAudit

        public void GenerateAudit()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        this is the GenerateAudit() method for the first round it will assign ballots to candidate and check if someone reach the droop number if a ballot's choice is a winner, then choice + 1 for the second round and so on remove candidates in the loser list with the least ballots redistribute his ballots to other non-winner candidate repeat until all seats are filled alone the way running the program write info to audit file and display the location when finished
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - write file may cause exception

      • ReadFile

        public void ReadFile()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
